strings.TKSAT_DISABLED_SKILL_DESCRIPTION: 某些东西暂时阻止了你使用这个技能！
strings.TKSAT_KEYWORD_TAUNT: <style=cKeywordName>嘲讽</style><style=cSub>嘲讽ed AI will only <style=cIsDamage>攻击</style> targets that have inflicted 嘲讽 on them, unless no other option is available. On both AI and survivors, any <style=cIsDamage>损害</style> inflicted on non-嘲讽ing targets is halved. 嘲讽 is removed if the source of 嘲讽 dies.</style>
strings.TKSAT_KEYWORD_FLOAT: <style=cKeywordName>浮动</style><style=cSub>浮动 holds a target at a fixed point in the air, then inflicts a damaging downwards slam when it expires. New stacks replace the previous one, inflicting the latter's damage immediately and resetting the duration if longer than its remaining time. On targets which can't be stunned, float inflicts its damage instantly.</style>
strings.TKSAT_KEYWORD_SUPPRESS: <style=cKeywordName>抑制</style><style=cSub>A 抑制 skill cannot be used and has its cooldowns frozen.</style>
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_EXPANSION_DESCRIPTION: 从“修补匠的书包”mod中添加独立内容到游戏中。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_VOIDEXPANSION_DESCRIPTION: 增加了“修补匠的书包”mod的内容，这也需要“虚空的幸存者”扩展是活跃的。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_EXTRAEQUIPMENT_PICKUP: 准备一件额外的装备。激活与记分牌打开翻找通过帆布包。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_EXTRAEQUIPMENT_DESC: Gainnot translation1not translation<style=cIsUtility>额外设备插槽</style>not translation<style=cStack>(+1not translationpernot translationstack)</style>.not translationActivatingnot translationyournot translationEquipmentnot translationwhilenot translationthenot translationscoreboardnot translationisnot translationopennot translationwillnot translationcyclenot translationthroughnot translationequipmentnot translationslotsnot translationinstead.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_DODGE_DESC: Perform a horizontal dodge, gaining a burst of speed of <style=cIsUtility>{1} m / s</style>在接地或<style=cIsUtility>{0} m / s</style>在空气中，并成为<style=cIsUtility>50秒内无懈可击</style>。本设备<style=cIsUtility>能容纳3倍的电荷</style>.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_LODESTONE_PICKUP: 拉动附近的敌人和盟友的物品效果。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_LODESTONE_DESC: <style=cIsUtility>拉</style>敌人向你移动100米以内<style=cIsDamage>{1}基础伤害</style>．<style=cIsUtility>拉</style> drops, orbs, and projectiles caused by ally items within {2} m to your location.
strings.ACHIEVEMENT_TKSAT_LODESTONE_DESCRIPTION: 项目设置：近景。同时拥有6个或更多（15个中的）。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_PACKBOX_DESC: Use once to <style=cIsUtility>打包</style>一个<style=cIsDamage>炮塔</style>，<style=cIsHealing>疗愈圣殿</style>，or <style=cIsUtility>大多数其他交互性</style>。使用again to<style=cIsUtility>的地方</style> the packed object and put the Cardboard Box on cooldown.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_RECOMBOBULATOR_DESC: <style=cIsUtility>二次轧制</style>一个可交互到对当前阶段有效的另一个。<style=cIsUtility>每个交互只工作一次</style>.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_REVIVEONCE_PICKUP: 复活一个盟友或召唤一个无人机。使用时消耗。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_REVIVEONCE_DESC: <style=cIsHealing>复苏</style>随机找一个幸存者，把他们叫到空投舱里。如果没有幸存者死亡，投送舱里会有<style=cIsUtility>随机的无人机</style>代替。<color=#FF7F7F>会在使用时消耗掉吗</style>.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_REWIND_PICKUP: 短暂地调整一下，然后倒回10秒钟。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_REWIND_DESC: Phase out of existence for <style=cIsUtility>{0}秒</style>．<style=cIsUtility>倒带</style>你的<style=cIsUtility>位置</style>，<style=cIsHealth>健康</style>，and <style=cIsUtility>技能冷却时间<style=cStack>(设备除外)</style></style>到他们的州<style=cIsUtility>{1}秒前</style>．<style=cStack>保存时间少于100秒时无法使用。</style>
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_REWIND_LORE:
订单：TIL-1.8c时间成像镜头原型
运单号：88***********
预计交货时间：从现在开始的{0}秒
运输方式：封闭时间曲线
收货地址：Petrichor V
航运细节:

修复了缓慢移动异常（< 0.01c）在照片中显示模糊的问题。希望我们现在能得到更好的结果。

不要摇晃——我不得不牺牲一些静态场的完整性。已经两次打电话给UES后勤纠正舱单，因为他们的设备自动检测到局部时间旅行。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_BISMUTHFLASK_PICKUP: Reduce duration of debuffs... <color=#FF7F7F>但是也减少了buff的持续时间。</color>
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_BISMUTHFLASK_DESC: Any debuffs inflicted on you <style=cIsUtility>能维持100年</style>。任何对你造成的buff<color=#FF7F7F>能维持100年</color>.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_CONCENTRATINGALEMBIC_PICK: Gain debuff strength and duration... <color=#FF7F7F>但失去了。</color>
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_CONCENTRATINGALEMBIC_DESC: Your ignites and bleeds deal <style=cIsDamage>+{0}的伤害</style>，所有对敌人造成的减益都是持续的<style=cIsUtility>{1}长</style>。你的近战攻击和爆炸攻击<color=#FF7F7F>{2}缩小范围/半径</color>你的弹丸<color=#FF7F7F>移动慢一点</color>，而你的点击扫描攻击<color=#FF7F7F>{4}缩小范围</color>.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_HEALSTODAMAGE_PICKUP: Some healed health grows a plant which boosts base stats... <color=#FF7F7F>但是你没有得到转化的治疗。</color>
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_HEALSTODAMAGE_DESC: Whenevernot translationyounot translationreceivenot translation<style=cIsHealing>疗愈</style>这也适用于<style=cIsHealth>健康</style>not translation<style=cStack>(regen,not translationbarrier,not translationandnot translationshieldnot translationdonot translationnotnot translationcount,not translationoverhealnot translationisnot translationreducednot translationbynot translation{3})</style>,not translation{0}not translation<style=cStack>(+{0}not translationpernot translationstack,not translationhyperbolic)</style>not translationofnot translationthisnot translation<style=cIsHealing>疗愈</style>not translationwillnot translationbenot translation<color=#FF7F7F>转换</color>.not translationFornot translationeverynot translation{1}not translationofnot translationyournot translationmaximumnot translation健康not translationinnot translation转换not translation疗愈,not translationgainnot translation{2}not translationsecondsnot translationofnot translation<style=cIsUtility>20%not translationBASEnot translationstatnot translationincreases</style>not translationtonot translationattacknot translationspeed,not translationmovenot translationspeed,not translationdamage,not translation健康not translationregen,not translationandnot translationjumpnot translationpower,not translationasnot translationwellnot translationasnot translationanot translationflatnot translation20%not translationcritnot translationchancenot translationandnot translation20not translationarmor.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_MOUNTAINTOKEN_PICKUP: Gain an extra item reward from teleporters... <color=#FF7F7F>但是跳得太久反而会让敌人得到道具。</color>
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_MOUNTAINTOKEN_DESC: The teleporter boss drops 1 <style=cIsUtility>额外的项目</style>当死亡<style=cStack>（每叠+1）</style>. As long as you remain in midair while the teleporter is charging, these 额外的项目s will gradually be <color=#FF7F7F>失去了</color>和<color=#FF7F7F>赐予所有敌人</color> within the teleporter zone. All 额外的项目s will be 失去了 after {0} seconds. The teleporter event will also become <color=#FF7F7F>稍微难一点</color> per stack.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_MOUNTAINTOKEN_LORE: 这座纪念碑是献给那些在风暴中丧生的人的
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_WAXFEATHER_PICKUP: Staying airborne ignites your attacks and reduces gravity... <color=#FF7F7F>但也削弱了你的装甲和速度。</color>
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_WAXFEATHER_DESC: Whilenot translationungrounded,not translationyounot translationbuildnot translationchargesnot translationofnot translationanot translationcombinationnot translationbuff/debuffnot translationatnot translation1not translationchargenot translationpernot translation{0}not translationseconds,not translationupnot translationtonot translation{1}not translation<style=cStack>（每堆叠+{1}）</style>．not translation有任何收费增加{2}的机会<style=cIsDamage>点燃你的攻击</style>为<style=cIsDamage>每次充电造成的伤害为100</style>，每次充电<style=cIsUtility>使你的重力减少100磅</style>not translation<style=cStack>(夸张)</style>.not translationEachnot translationchargenot translationalsonot translation<color=#FF7F7F>reducesnot translationyournot translationarmornot translationbynot translation{5}not translation(linear)not translationandnot translationspeednot translationbynot translation{6}not translation(linearnot translationdivisor)</color>.not translationWhilenot translationgrounded,not translationyounot translationlosenot translationchargesnot translation{7}not translationasnot translationfastnot translationasnot translationtheynot translationarenot translationgained.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_COMPASS_PICKUP: Shows you a path... <style=cDeath>但这将充满危险。</style>
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_COMPASS_DESC: <style=cIsUtility>立刻发现了传送器</style>． 还添加了一个堆栈<style=cShrine>山的挑战</style> to the current stage{0}.{1}
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_COMPASS_DESC_PERPLAYER: 每个玩家每个阶段只工作100次。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_EMP_PICKUP: Disable skills on enemies... <style=cDeath>但是对幸存者禁用非主要技能。</style>
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_EMP_DESC: For {0} seconds, <style=cIsUtility>所有技能</style>论敌人和<style=cIsUtility>非主技能</style>100米内的幸存者将会<color=#FF7F7F>禁用</color>． 也清除<style=cIsDamage>敌人的炮弹</style> when used.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_MONKEYSPAW_PICKUP: Open a chest for cheap and drop an extra item... <style=cDeath>但是活着的敌人也会收到道具。</style>
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_MONKEYSPAW_DESC: Use on a chest to <style=cIsUtility>打开胸腔为b{0}降低成本</style>并添加<style=cIsUtility>多一件</style>它的雨滴。<style=cDeath>所有活着的敌人也会获得物品</style>, with count dependent on rarity (5 Common, 3 Uncommon, or 1 Rare).
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_UNSTABLEBOMB_PICKUP: Throw a bomb that will detonate when damaged... <style=cDeath>但它也可能伤害幸存者。</style>
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_UNSTABLEBOMB_DESC: Throw a <style=cIsDamage>实弹臼弹</style>它会嵌入地面。受到任何伤害后，或10秒后，弹壳<style=cIsDamage>爆炸造成100点伤害</style>来<style=cDeath>所有的人物</style> in range.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_EXTENDOARMS_PICKUP: 攻击范围更远，造成的伤害略高。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_EXTENDOARMS_DESC: Gain <style=cIsUtility>{1} /半径范围<style=cStack>（每堆叠+{1}）</style></style>对于近身攻击和你周围100米范围内的aoe，<style=cIsUtility>{3}速度<style=cStack>（每堆叠+{3}）</style></style>对于抛射攻击，和<style=cIsUtility>{4}最大范围<style=cStack>（每堆叠+{4}）</style></style>针对命中扫描攻击。也获得<style=cIsDamage>{2}损害<style=cStack>（每堆叠+{2}）</style></style>.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_MAGNETISM_PICKUP: 你的攻击变得有轻微的磁性，并获得暴击几率。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_MAGNETISM_DESC: Your projectile attacks <style=cIsUtility>跟踪</style>面对内心的敌人<style=cIsUtility>{0}°（每{2}层增加一半到{1}°）</style>． 你的近战攻击会产生一个半径为<style=cIsUtility>{3}米<style=cStack>（每堆叠+{3}）</style></style>． 也获得<style=cIsDamage>%暴击几率<style=cStack>（每叠+{4}%）</style></style>.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_MIMIC_PICKUP: 随机模仿你的其他物品。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_MIMIC_DESC: Picksnot translationonenot translationofnot translationyournot translationothernot translationitemsnot translationtonot translation<style=cIsUtility>模仿</style>not translation<style=cStack>(eachnot translationstacknot translationisnot translationtrackednot translationseparately)</style>not translationfromnot translationanot translationweightednot translationselectionnot translationofnot translation{0}not translationofnot translationyournot translationitemnot translationtypesnot translationofnot translationeachnot translationtier.not translation<style=cIsUtility>Everynot translation{1}not translationsecond(s)</style>,not translationallnot translation模仿snot translationwillnot translation<style=cIsUtility>争夺</style>not translationtonot translationanot translationnewnot translationselection.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_MIMIC_LORE: This is getting out of hand. A couple weeks ago, Jameson figured out that the mimics can be tamed... but only enough to keep them from chomping your fingers off. That was good enough for most of the crew. A few of them also became of the opinion that they're kind of cute -- the 一个s that aren't trying to kill us planetside, anyway. So we've started taking them as pets. Didn't account for 一个 thing until it was too late, though: their mimickry and hiding instincts? 没有摆脱那些。所以…现在我们的船上装满了不确定自己应该是什么的东西。 我发誓，如果我最喜欢的杯子因为我的咖啡太热而跑掉了一个 more time....
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_MOTIONTRACKER_PICKUP: 定期向所有敌人发射弱射弹。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_MOTIONTRACKER_DESC: Fornot translation6not translationsecondsnot translationafternot translationhittingnot translationornot translationbeingnot translationhitnot translationbynot translationannot translationenemy,not translationstrikenot translationwithnot translationannot translationorbitalnot translationlasernot translationfornot translation<style=cIsDamage>{0}的伤害</style>not translation<style=cStack>(+{2}not translationpernot translationstack)</style>not translationeverynot translation{1}not translationseconds.
strings.ACHIEVEMENT_TKSAT_MOTIONTRACKER_DESCRIPT: 在不杀死boss或死亡的情况下给传送器充满电。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_MOUSTACHE_PICKUP: 被击中时有机会嘲讽。抵抗嘲笑的敌人。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_MOUSTACHE_DESC: <style=cIsUtility>{0}<style=cStack>(+{0}per stack)</style></style>命中的概率<style=cIsUtility>嘲讽</style>敌人的<style=cIsUtility>{1}秒</style>． 也收到<style=cIsHealing>{2}减少伤害</style>和<style=cIsHealing>{3}减少反击</style>从<style=cIsUtility>嘲讽ed</style> enemies.
strings.ACHIEVEMENT_TKSAT_MOUSTACHE_DESCRIPTION: 参加一场非常繁忙的战斗。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_MUG_PICKUP: 有机会发射额外的、不可预测的炮弹。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_MUG_DESC: All projectile attacks gain a <style=cIsDamage>{0}<style=cStack>(+{0}per stack)</style></style>开火的机会<style=cIsDamage>额外的副本</style>与<color=#FF7F7F>{1}°的误差</style>. Melee or homing-projectile attacks gain an equal开火的机会a weak projectile for {2} or {3} of the attack damage.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_MUG_LORE: 底座周围的铭文写着：“岩石和石头！”
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_SHOOTTOHEAL_DESC: Hitting an ally with a direct attack heals them for <style=cIsHealing>{0}最大健康值<style=cStack>（每堆叠+{0}）</style></style> and you for {1} as much. Scales with attack damage coefficient and proc coefficient.
strings.ACHIEVEMENT_TKSAT_SHOOTTOHEAL_DESCRIPTIO: 物品组：乐器。同时拥有3个或更多（6个中的）。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_TRIBROOCH_PICKUP: 有机会结合点燃，冻结和眩晕。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_TRIBROOCH_DESC: <style=cIsDamage>点燃</style>，<style=cIsDamage>冻结</style>，and <style=cIsUtility>令人震惊的</style>有一个b{0}的几率也会引起其他的影响吗<style=cIsDamage>{1}基础伤害<style=cStack>（每堆叠+{2}）</style></style>．<style=cStack>造成80%的减速而不是冻结。</style>
strings.ACHIEVEMENT_TKSAT_TRIBROOCH_DESCRIPTION: 团队：晕眩，然后冻结，然后在3秒内点燃同一敌人。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_DAMAGEBUFFER_PICKUP: 随着时间的推移，受到伤害会产生治疗障碍。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_DAMAGEBUFFER_DESC: <style=cIsDamage>{0}<style=cStack>(+{0}per stack, linear)</style>收到的损害</style>被授予<style=cIsHealing>障碍</style>在{1}秒内逐渐施加，滴答{2}。有<style=cIsHealing>障碍</style>让你的<style=cIsHealing>回复最多100次更有效<style=cStack>（每层+{3}，线性）</style></style>根据你的<style=cIsHealing>障碍</style> is to maximum.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_DEADMANSWITCH_PICKUP: 在低血量时免费自动激活你的装备。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_DEADMANSWITCH_DESC: Falling below <style=cIsHealth>{1}健康</style>激活你的<style=cIsUtility>设备</style> without putting it on cooldown. This effect has its own cooldown equal to the cooldown of the activated 设备 <style=cStack>（-{0} / stack, mult）</style>.
strings.ACHIEVEMENT_TKSAT_DEADMANSWITCH_DESCRIPT: 在同一回合内存活9次降至低血量（每次必须恢复到50%以上血量）。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_DEFIB_DESC: Any <style=cIsHealing>疗愈</style>因为你才有机会<style=cIsHealing>批判性的治愈</style>等于你的<style=cIsDamage>暴击几率</style>．<style=cIsHealing>关键的治疗</style>治愈的<style=cIsHealth>+ {0}<style=cStack>(+ {0}per stack)</style>更多的惠普</style>.
strings.ACHIEVEMENT_TKSAT_DEFIB_DESCRIPTION: 项目组：共享治疗。一次吃4个或更多（7个中的）。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_ENPASSANT_PICKUP: 近战攻击使用你的实用技能来补充能量。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_ENPASSANT_DESC: Afternotnot translationtranslationactivatingnotnot translationtranslationyournotnot translationtranslationUtilitynotnot translationtranslationskill,notnot translationtranslationfirenotnot translationtranslationanotnot translationtranslationhorizontalnotnot translationtranslation<style=cIsDamage>近身攻击</style>它能持续100秒并且有优惠<style=cIsDamage>{0}的伤害</style>notnot translationtranslation<style=cStack>(+{0}notnot translationtranslationpernotnot translationtranslationstack)</style>.notnot translationtranslationEachnotnot translationtranslationhitnotnot translationtranslationwithnotnot translationtranslationthisnotnot translationtranslationattacknotnot translationtranslation<style=cIsUtility>rechargesnotnot translationtranslationyournotnot translationtranslationUtilitynotnot translationtranslationskillnotnot translationtranslationbynotnot translationtranslation{2}notnot translationtranslationseconds</style>notnot translationtranslation<style=cStack>(+{2}notnot translationtranslationsnotnot translationtranslationpernotnot translationtranslationstack)</style>.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_FUDGEDICE_DESC: Once every {0} seconds <style=cStack>（-每层{1}，双曲线）</style>下一个随机效应是<style=cIsUtility>运气很好</style>.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_GOLDENGEAR_PICKUP: 收集金钱可以获得临时护甲。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_GOLDENGEAR_DESC: Fornot translationeverynot translation<style=cIsUtility>$not translation{0}</style>收集<style=cStack>（难度等级）</style>,获得<style=cIsHealing>1护甲</style>not translation<style=cStack>(+1not translationpernot translationstack,not translation-{1}not translationpernot translationpointnot translationofnot translationarmornot translationbeforenot translationstacking)</style>not translationfornot translation{2}not translationseconds.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_GOLDENGEAR_LORE:
返回：P-2W型催化装甲系统
运单号：09******
预计交货时间：2056年7月8日
运输方式：标准
收货地址：Ganymede Marv港13号警察局
退货原因：

你是认真的吗？首先，这不是我点的菜。第二，别让联调局的人进入我的辖区。

“在没有必要的维护费用的情况下锁定物理DRM”，我发誓，谁会想出……

退款:
替换:X
strings.ACHIEVEMENT_TKSAT_GOLDENGEAR_DESCRIPTION: 从机会神殿购买最后一件掉落4次以上的物品
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_HURDYGURDY_PICKUP: 获得不间断的二级技能，发射燃烧的炮弹。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_HURDYGURDY_DESC: Add <style=cIsUtility>{2}<style=cStack>（每堆叠+{3}）</style></style>你的收费<style=cIsUtility>辅助技能</style>． 经过b{1}或更多不间断的使用您的<style=cIsUtility>辅助技能</style>,发射<style=cIsDamage>1<style=cStack>(+1per stack)</style>燃烧的字符串</style>瞄准你面前的目标<style=cIsDamage>点燃伤害</style>.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_KLEINBOTTLE_PICKUP: 有机会漂浮并击晕附近受到伤害的敌人。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_KLEINBOTTLE_DESC: After taking damage, {0} <style=cStack>（每个堆栈+{0}，多重）</style>机会<style=cIsUtility>浮动</style>和<style=cIsUtility>眩晕</style> enemies within {1} m for {2} seconds和<style=cIsDamage>{3}损害</style>．<style=cStack>内部冷却时间为100秒。</style>
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_KLEINBOTTLE_LORE:
订购：“不稳定克莱因瓶”
运单号：23******
预计交货时间：2056年4月9日
运输方式：易碎品
收货地址：43楼，摇摇欲坠的大厦，维纳斯
航运细节:

这一次真是太棒了。在这个概念验证的最后阶段差点把我们的一个技工吸进去。但你的配方奏效了！我们已经送过去给你检查了。

小心别把它弄掉了。理论上，这个结构的时间亚稳态应该会使它在玻璃破碎时恢复原状，我们认为它的拓扑结构会在爆炸时在中间留下一个安全气泡…但我们都没有足够的勇气去验证这一点。输掉这场比赛可能会让我们倒退几周，更不用说受伤和受伤的可能性了，即使我们是对的。
strings.ACHIEVEMENT_TKSAT_KLEINBOTTLE_DESCRIPTIO: 连续阻挡3次攻击，或受到1点或更少的伤害。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_PIXIETUBE_PICKUP: 在使用技能时掉落随机buff。

数据表：EE555元素敏感随机定时器

特点:
—计时从毫秒到秒
-运行非常不稳定
-电流响应占空比
- ttl不兼容的输出将源高达200ta在非神秘启动电路

应用程序:
-灵魂生物识别技术
-预言引擎
-二级元素召唤装置
<style=cMono>文件继续（33页第1页）。按任意键进入页面。</style>
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_SWORDBREAKER_PICKUP: 当你的盾牌被击中时，用爆炸的火花进行报复。

strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_GOFASTER_PICKUP: 你的实用技能获得更多的机动性。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_GOFASTER_DESC: Upgrades your <style=cIsUtility>实用的技能</style>，大大增加了<style=cIsUtility>流动性</style>.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_GOFASTER_LORE:
<style=cMono>//——自动转录从UES[编辑]——//</style>

"...What are you doing?"

"Painting my armor."

"Why!?"

"To make it go faster."

"What!? That’s just a myth! And-- and it’s supposed to be for cars! And in case you haven’t noticed, we are -in the middle of a warzone-! We don’t have -time- for--"

"Red stripes make things go faster. More speed means more time. You’ll see."
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_HEADSET_PICKUP: 你的实用技能会产生一个惊人的静电。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_HEADSET_DESC: Afternot translationactivatingnot translationyournot translation<style=cIsUtility>实用的技能</style>，接下来的100个敌人<style=cStack>（每堆叠+{1}）</style>你的道路将会交叉<style=cIsDamage>承受b{2}的伤害</style>not translation<style=cStack>(+{3}not translationpernot translationstack)</style>not translationandnot translationbenot translation<style=cIsUtility>stunnednot translationfornot translation{4}not translationseconds</style>.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_HEADSET_LORE:
你终于找到了适合你长筒秋靴的长筒秋裤。虽然你可能会把零件重新组装起来，但这是一个完美的机会……创新。

动动脑筋。
strings.ACHIEVEMENT_TKSAT_HEADSET_DESCRIPTION: 用最大伤害H3AD-5T v2爆炸击杀一个boss
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_KINTSUGI_PICKUP: 你的破碎/消耗/报废物品会增加你的所有属性。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_KINTSUGI_DESC: Each of your broken, consumed, or scrapped items increases <style=cIsUtility>所有统计数据</style>基于它的层级<style=cStack>(栈线性)</style>: {0} for Common items, {1} for Uncommon items, and {2} for Rare/Boss items.
strings.ACHIEVEMENT_TKSAT_KINTSUGI_DESCRIPTION: 至少有20件物品，其中至少有一半是坏的/消耗的/报废的。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_PINBALL_DESC: All your projectile attacks have a {0} chance to bounce, <style=cIsDamage>爆炸</style>一次额外的时间<style=cIsUtility>归航</style>朝向一个随机的敌人<style=cIsDamage>他们原来的损坏</style>． 可以发生到<style=cIsDamage>{2} *<style=cStack>（每堆叠+{3}）</style></style> per projectile. Melee attacks gain an equal chance to fire a weak projectile for {4} of the attack damage.
strings.ACHIEVEMENT_TKSAT_PINBALL_DESCRIPTION: 道具组：Damage-on-kill。同时拥有3个或更多（6个中的）。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_SHRINKRAY_PICKUP: 压制一个目标的伤害和非主要技能。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_SHRINKRAY_DESC: Once every {0} seconds, hitting an enemy disables their <style=cIsUtility>非主技能</style>减少他们的<style=cIsDamage>损害</style>在{2}秒内<style=cStack>（每叠+{2}秒）</style>.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_SKEIN_PICKUP: 静止时增加质量。移动时失去质量。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_SKEIN_DESC: Standing still reduces all <style=cIsDamage>伤害和击退</style>你取的是<style=cIsDamage>{0}<style=cStack>(+{0}per stack, hyperbolic)</style></style>． 移动，增加<style=cIsUtility>移动和攻击速度</style>到<style=cIsUtility>{1}<style=cStack>(+{1}per stack, linear)</style></style>. Each effect ramps up over {2} seconds, while the other effect is lost {3} as fast. Taking damage forces the movement effect to charge for {4} seconds.
strings.ACHIEVEMENT_TKSAT_SKEIN_DESCRIPTION: 完成补锅匠背包中的全部4项成就。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_WRANGLER_PICKUP: 附近的炮塔和无人机获得攻击速度，并为你提供护甲。Ping控制。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_WRANGLER_DESC: All <style=cIsDamage>炮塔和无人机</style>在你的所有权下<style=cIsUtility>在100米之内</style>将获得<style=cIsDamage>+{1}攻击速度<style=cStack>（每堆叠+{2}）</style></style>我同意你<style=cIsHealing>+{3}装甲<style=cStack>（每堆叠+{3}）</style></style>．<style=cIsUtility>平</style> a turret or drone to override its targeting AI, and again to restore normal AI．Overridden allies <style=cIsUtility>不再自动瞄准，自动攻击或追逐敌人</style>，但可能会被命令向你的目标开火<style=cIsUtility>主要技能</style> keybind.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_VILLAINOUSVISAGE_PICKUP: Briefly stealth for a damage boost after killing powerful opponents. <style=cIsVoid>腐蚀了所有大男子主义的小胡子</style>.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_VILLAINOUSVISAGE_DESC: Killing an elite enemy or a boss causes you to gain <style=cIsUtility>隐身</style>为<style=cIsUtility>{0}秒</style>． 攻击而<style=cIsUtility>看不见的</style>由于这个项目打破潜行和交易<style=cIsDamage>+{1}的伤害<style=cStack>（每堆叠+{1}）</style></style>．<style=cIsVoid>腐蚀了所有大男子主义的小胡子</style>.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_CHAOTICEFFIGY_PICKUP: Chance to create temporary item totems on kills. <style=cIsVoid>腐化所有驯服的模仿者</style>.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_CHAOTICEFFIGY_DESC: Killing an enemy has a <style=cIsUtility>{0}的机会<style>（每层+{0}，双曲线）</style></style>创建一个<style=cIsUtility>项图腾</style>，给予b{1}米范围内的幸存者1件1级宝箱物品<style=cStack>（2级精英，3级boss）</style>持续100秒。<style=cIsVoid>腐化所有驯服的模仿者</style>.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_OBSIDIANBROOCH_PICKUP: Chance to spread DoTs on hit. <style=cIsVoid>腐蚀所有的三叉戟胸针</style>.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_OBSIDIANBROOCH_DESC: Whenever you hit an enemy, {0} chance <style=cStack>（每堆滚动一次）</style>镜像他们中的一个<style=cIsDamage>damage-over-time效果</style>在100米范围内的随机敌人。<style=cIsVoid>腐蚀所有的三叉戟胸针</style>.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_TIMELOSTRUM_PICKUP: Chance to cause temporal echoes of attacks. <style=cIsVoid>腐蚀所有坚固的马克杯</style>.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_TIMELOSTRUM_DESC: All projectile attacks gain a <style=cIsDamage>{0}<style=cStack>(+{0}per stack)</style></style>开火的机会<style=cIsDamage>额外的副本</style>与<color=#FF7F7F>bbb50秒的延迟</style>． 近战攻击延迟一段时间后获得相同几率的攻击伤害。<style=cIsVoid>腐蚀所有坚固的马克杯</style>.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_TIMELOSTRUM_LORE: 标签剩下的部分写着：“ROC??”“K”和“S?TO?NE”！
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_BRAMBLERING_PICKUP: Taking damage creates a thorny barrier. <style=cIsVoid>破坏所有的负反馈循环</style>.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_BRAMBLERING_DESC: Afternot translation<style=cIsDamage>采取损害</style>获得；获得<style=cIsHealing>暂时的屏障</style>为<style=cIsHealing>{1}<style=cStack>(+{1}pernot translationstack,not translationhyperbolic)</style>所受到的损害</style>．<style=cIsDamage>2b{0}的伤害被你的<style=cIsHealing>障碍</style>not translation<style=cStack>(+2x{0}not translationpernot translationstack,not translationhyperbolic)</style></style>not translationisnot translationtakennot translationbynot translationthenot translationinflictor:not translationoncenot translationinstantly,not translationandnot translationoncenot translationasnot translation<style=cIsDamage>流血</style>．<style=cIsVoid>Corruptsnot translationallnot translationNegativenot translationFeedbacknot translationLoops</style>.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_ORDEREDARMOR_PICKUP: Gain massive armor by focusing your item build. <style=cIsVoid>腐蚀所有的板栗</style>.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_ORDEREDARMOR_DESC: Gainnot translation<style=cIsHealing>护甲</style>基于你目前持有的<style=cIsUtility>项目类型</style>（越少越好）。只有<style=cIsVoid>秩序镜头</style>给了<style=cIsHealing>{0}not translation护甲</style>not translation<style=cStack>(+{1}not translationpernot translationstack,not translationlinear)</style>;not translationeachnot translationsubsequentnot translationitemnot translationtypenot translation<style=cIsUtility>reducesnot translation护甲not translationbonusnot translationbynot translation{2}</style>.not translation<style=cIsVoid>Corruptsnot translationallnot translationChestplates</style>.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_VOIDWISPHIVE_PICKUP: Drop damaging wisp allies on using skills. <style=cIsVoid>腐蚀所有的精灵管</style>.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_VOIDWISPHIVE_DESC: Younot translationdropnot translationanot translation<style=cIsDamage>voidwisp</style>当你<style=cIsUtility>使用任何技能</style>not translation<style=cStack>({0}not translationsnot translationindividualnot translationcooldownnot translationonnot translationeachnot translationskill,not translation{1}not translationsnot translationonnot translationprimarynot translationskill)</style>.not translation<style=cIsDamage>Voidwisps</style>not translationlivenot translationfornot translation{2}not translationseconds,not translationtrackingnot translationnearbynot translationenemiesnot translationandnot translationzappingnot translationthemnot translationfornot translation<style=cIsDamage>{3}x{4}not translationdamagenot translationpernot translationsecondnot translation<style=cStack>(damagenot translationincreasesnot translationlinearlynot translationpernot translationstack)</style></style>.not translation<style=cIsVoid>Corruptsnot translationallnot translationPixienot translationTubes</style>.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_GUPRAY_PICKUP: Split enemies into two much weaker copies. <style=cIsVoid>破坏所有收缩射线</style>.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_GUPRAY_DESC: Oncenot translationeverynot translation{0}not translationseconds,not translationhittingnot translationanot translationnon-final-bossnot translationenemynot translation<style=cIsUtility>分裂</style>用{1}把它们分成两份<style=cIsHealth>健康</style>和<style=cIsDamage>损害</style>，还有b{2}<style=cIsUtility>速度</style>和<style=cIsUtility>attacknot translation速度</style>．<style=cStack>每一堆敌人可以分裂1次。</style>not translation<style=cIsVoid>Corruptsnot translationallnot translationShrinknot translationRays</style>.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_LOOM_PICKUP: All your attacks become progressively slower and more powerful. <style=cIsVoid>腐蚀所有时空线</style>.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_LOOM_DESC: Each <style=cIsDamage>战斗技能</style>使用给你<style=cIsDamage>-{1}攻击速度和+{1}伤害</style>持续100秒<style=cStack>（每堆叠+ bbb50秒）</style>，最多可达100次<style=cStack>（每堆叠+{3}）</style>．<style=cIsVoid>腐蚀所有时空线</style>.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_NAUTILUSPROTOCOL_PICKUP: All turrets and drones gain flat armor and regen, and a slight damage bonus. Ping to detonate. <style=cIsVoid>破坏所有RC控制器</style>.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_NAUTILUSPROTOCOL_DESC: All <style=cIsDamage>炮塔和无人机</style>在你的所有权下<style=cIsUtility>{0}的盔甲<style=cStack>（每堆叠+{0}）</style></style>，<style=cIsHealing>{1}生命回复<style=cStack>（每堆叠+{1}）</style></style>，and <style=cIsDamage>{2}损害<style=cStack>（每堆叠+{2}）</style></style>．<style=cIsUtility>平</style>炮塔或无人机（每架无人机的冷却时间为50秒）造成巨大伤害<style=cIsDamage>空爆</style>，damaging the ally for <style=cDeath>50%最大生命值</style>敌人在100米以内<style=cIsDamage>{4}</style> of the inflicted self-damage．<style=cIsVoid>破坏所有RC控制器</style>.
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_ANTIAIR_DESC: 玩家在空中受到的伤害大大增加。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_BUTTERKNIFE_DESC: 所有战士攻击速度提高10倍，造成1/20倍伤害。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_DELAYLOOT_DESC: 所有掉落的物品都由传送者的boss拿走并守卫，当被杀死时，传送者的boss会爆炸出大量的战利品。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_DISPOSABLEEQUIP_DESC: 从{0}设备插槽开始。装备更常见，并且是消耗而不是冷却。
strings.TINKERSSATCHEL_PACKTACTICS_DESC: 所有战斗人员都会给附近的队友增加速度、伤害和护甲。
strings.TKSAT_BULWARKDRONE_INSPECT: A companion bought with gold that will follow the survivor, Taunting half of nearby enemies every 5 seconds. Resilient, self-repairing, and starts with one stack of <style=cIsHealing>Razorwire</style>.
strings.TKSAT_ITEMDRONE_POPUP_TEXT: 项无人机not translation选择一个项目来插入…
strings.TKSAT_ITEMDRONE_INSPECT: A companion bought with items that will follow the survivor，granting the effects of those items to all allies in a huge radius. Can accept up to <color=#FFFFFF>5个常见</color>，<color=#77FF17>3常见</color>，or <color=#E7543A>1罕见</color> item(s).
strings.TKSAT_COMMANDO_PRIMARY_PULSE_DESCRIPTION: Rapidly shoot an enemy 4 times with high recoil. <style=cIs损害>损害</style>每个镜头从<style=cIs损害>75% - 150%</style> over the course of the burst.

Rapidly shoot an enemy 4 times. <style=cIs损害>损害</style>每个镜头从<style=cIs损害>75%</style>达到最大值<style=cIs损害>150%</style> over the course of the burst, increasing over the course of 20 hits to the same target without missing.
strings.TKSAT_COMMANDO_SPECIAL_PLASMAGRENADE_DES: <style=cIsDamage>点燃</style>． 扔一枚黏弹，近距离制导，爆炸时间为<style=cIsDamage>500%的伤害</style>． 保持到2。<style=cStack>在矮墙附近要注意瞄准。</style>
<style=cIsDamage>点燃</style>． 扔一枚黏弹，近距离制导，爆炸时间为<style=cIsDamage>500%的伤害</style>． 保持到2。<style=cStack>在矮墙附近要注意瞄准。</style>not translation<color=#d299ff>权杖：双倍爆炸半径和伤害。</color>
strings.TKSAT_COMMANDO_UTILITY_JINKJET_DESCRIPTI: Perform a small jet-assisted horizontal jump in your <style=cIsUtility>目标方向</style>. Hold up to 3.
strings.TKSAT_HUNTRESS_PRIMARY_BOMBARROW_DESCRIP: <style=cIsUtility>敏捷</style>． 快速射出一支不寻找的箭<style=cIsDamage>150%的伤害</style>，然后又爆发出另一个<style=cIsDamage>150%</style> after a short delay. Both hits trigger on-hit effects.
strings.TKSAT_HUNTRESS_SECONDARY_BOLA_DESCRIPTIO: Throw a seeking hard-light net which <style=cIsUtility>减速和拉扯</style>目标群和交易<style=cIsDamage>300%的伤害</style> over time.
strings.TKSAT_ENGI_PRIMARY_FLAK_DESCRIPTION: Continuously fire proximity fragmentation shells. Direct hits deal <style=cIsDamage>50%的伤害</style>． 弹片追踪敌人长达<style=cIsDamage>8 x25%损害<style=cStack>（单个目标最大5x25%）</style></style>.
strings.TKSAT_ENGI_SECONDARY_CHAFF_DESCRIPTION: Deal <style=cIsDamage>4 x75%损害</style>和<style=cIsUtility>清除敌方炮弹</style>在额锥上。在你的任何一个炮塔的视线范围内被击中的敌人将被<style=cIsUtility>嘲笑</style> by a turret for 6 seconds.
strings.TKSAT_ENGI_UTILITY_SPEEDISPENSER_DESCRIP: Deploy a <style=cIsUtility>固定玻璃水瓶</style>可以储存多达四种美味的，含咖啡因的，精心酿造的<style=cIsUtility>冲刺的速度</style>和<style=cIsUtility>跳的高度</style>．<style=cIsUtility>继承你所有的物品</style>.
strings.TKSAT_OVERLAY_KNOCKBACKHITENEMIES_PICKUP: 被击中时有机会浮起来。
strings.TKSAT_OVERLAY_KNOCKBACKHITENEMIES_DESC: <style=cIsUtility>{0}not translation%</style>not translation<style=cStack>(+{0}not translation%not translationpernot translationstack,not translationhyperbolic)</style>not translationchancenot translationonnot translationhitnot translationtonot translation<style=cIsUtility>浮动</style>not translationenemiesnot translationfornot translation<style=cIsUtility>{1}not translationseconds</style>not translationandnot translation<style=cIsDamage>{2}%not translationbasenot translationdamage</style>.
